ygData.subject: Post from Abashi regarding archery
ygData.msgSnippet: http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum2/HTML/020431.html I know this doesn t affect bards since we can t use bows, but something Abashi said raises a
ygData.messageBody:
http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum2/HTML/020431.html

I know this doesn't affect bards since we can't use bows, but something
Abashi said raises a question.

I was never aware that primary and secondary attacks were delayed after
casting a spell. In other words, you temporarily stop swinging for X number
of seconds after casting a spell. X is the your weapon DLY/10.

So does this affects bards? We are constantly weaving songs so do we also
stop swinging for X amount of seconds after our songs start? I've never
really noticed it myself so am inclined to believe this does not affect us.
Can someone confirm?

Galtin of E'ci


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
